CheckRule.document: This API is used to check a rule.
CheckRule.name: Checks rule

CheckTransformation.document: This API is used to test rules and data on the ETL configuration page.
CheckTransformation.name: Checks transformer

CreateConnection.document: This API is used to create an event connector.
CreateConnection.name: Creates event connector

CreateEventBus.document: This API is used to create an event bus.
CreateEventBus.name: Creats an event bus

CreateRule.document: This API is used to create an event rule.
CreateRule.name: Creates event rule

CreateTarget.document: This API is used to create a delivery target.
CreateTarget.name: Creates delivery target

CreateTransformation.document: This API is used to create a transformer.
CreateTransformation.name: Creates transformer

DeleteConnection.document: This API is used to delete an event connector.
DeleteConnection.name: Deletes event connector

DeleteEventBus.document: This API is used to delete an event bus.
DeleteEventBus.name: Deletes event bus

DeleteRule.document: This API is used to delete an event rule.
DeleteRule.name: Deletes event rule

DeleteTarget.document: This API is used to delete a delivery target.
DeleteTarget.name: Deletes delivery target

DeleteTransformation.document: This API is used to delete a transformer.
DeleteTransformation.name: Deletes transformer

GetEventBus.document: This API is used to get the details of an event bus.
GetEventBus.name: Gets details of an event bus

GetRule.document: This API is used to get the details of an event rule.
GetRule.name: Gets event rule details

GetTransformation.document: This API is used to get the details of a transformer.
GetTransformation.name: Gets transformer details

ListConnections.document: This API is used to get the list of event connectors.
ListConnections.name: Gets event connector list

ListEventBuses.document: This API is used to get the list of event buses.
ListEventBuses.name: Gets event bus list

ListRules.document: This API is used to get the list of event rules.
ListRules.name: Gets event rule list

ListTargets.document: This API is used to get the list delivery targets.
ListTargets.name: Gets delivery target list

UpdateConnection.document: This API is used to update an event connector.
UpdateConnection.name: Updates event connector

UpdateEventBus.document: This API is used to update an event bus.
UpdateEventBus.name: Updates an event bus

UpdateRule.document: This API is used to update an event rule.
UpdateRule.name: Updates event rule

UpdateTarget.document: This API is used to update a delivery target.
UpdateTarget.name: Updates delivery target

UpdateTransformation.document: This API is used to update a transformer.
UpdateTransformation.name: Updates transformer.

Filter.document:
Key-Value pair filter for conditional filtering queries, such as filtering ID, name, and status
* If more than one filter exists, the logical relationship between these filters is `AND`.
* If multiple values exist in one filter, the logical relationship between these values is `OR`.
